paper_abstract: A variant of the Euclidean traveling salesman problem (TSP) is defined and studied. In the three-dimensional space, the objective function is to lexicographically minimize the x-moves, then the y-moves and finally the z-moves. The 2D and 3D cases are first studied and solved as a shortest path problem. Then the approach is generalized to the d-dimensional case.
paper_title: Lexicographically minimizing axial motions for the Euclidean TSP
